extendedInfo.description: Turn it to put your mobile in silence and/or to stop data transfer! This application uses the accelerometer to determine the rotation of your mobile and then do the actions: put the cell phone and/or stop the data transfer. Every time you put it face down will act in one way or another doing the actions you decide, and the actions will be undo when you put the mobile face up. To start this service add a widget on your desktop and activate it. Remember if you don't check any checkbox ,no action will be done. You can decide whether to start service at boot, that is, when you turn on the device.It is completely free and has no banners or any type of advertising! Also if you  think about any other action that may be helpful with this gesture, please contact me via email and we will discuss about it.
